HunMineR 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Central Bank of Hungary press releases

data_mnb_pr.Rd

The dataset contains 180 press releases from the Magyar Nemzeti Bank (MNB). These are released after the monetary council meetings.

data_mnb_pr

Format

It is a data.frame, with 180 observation, 4 variables:

date

Date of the press release

text

The unprocessed press release texts

id

Unique id of the press releases

year

Year of the press release

Source

https://github.com/poltextlab/central_bank_communication

References

Máté Á, Sebők M, Barczikay T (2021). The effect of central bank communication on sovereign bond yields: The case of Hungary. PLoS ONE, 16(2): e0245515.

Contents

Developed by Ákos Máté, Sebők Miklós, Ring Orsolya, poltextLab.
